name: Arduinoweatherstation
tagline: weather station based on arduino. Developed on Uno and Mega.
body:
This is an arduino weatherstation without its own webserver.
I use a Arduino Uno. The Arduino Uno is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega328.

![uno](http://maxoberberger.net/media/images/projects/arduino-weatherstation/ArduinoUno.jpg)


Supported sensors:
 * Temperature
 * Pressure

![temperature/pressure](http://maxoberberger.net/media/images/projects/arduino-weatherstation/bmp085.jpg)

 * Humidity

![humidity](http://maxoberberger.net/media/images/projects/arduino-weatherstation/hih4030.jpg)


 * Windspeed
 * Winddirection
 * rainfall

![windsensor](http://maxoberberger.net/media/images//projects/arduino-weatherstation/sensor.png)
